entries.meaning: Able or fit to be endorsed.
examples: Suppose we think that morality is a system of rules that is endorsable by all because each has good reason to accept those rules.

entries.meaning: (law, of a driving offence) Leading to endorsement of one's driving licence with penalty points.
(of an airline ticket) That other airlines are obliged to accept in the event of the airline that issued the ticket failing to fly the ticket-holder.
